status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: When {{eval `clcadmin-assume-system-credentials`}} is used, euare-* commands fails due to missing AWSAccessKeyId parameter, {noformat} [root@d-03 ~]# eval `clcadmin-assume-system-credentials` [root@d-03 ~]# echo $EC2_ACCESS_KEY AKIAARTJRF5CDDLVJWJZ [root@d-03 ~]# echo $EC2_SECRET_KEY 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 [root@d-03 ~]# echo $AWS_ACCESS_KEY AKIAARTJRF5CDDLVJWJZ [root@d-03 ~]# echo $AWS_SECRET_KEY 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 [root@d-03 ~]# euare-accountlist euare-accountlist: error (403 Forbidden): Missing required parameter: AWSAccessKeyId [root@d-03 ~]# euare-accountlist --debug 2015-09-15 08:18:39,728 DEBUG ListAccounts parsed arguments: {'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'region': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None} 2015-09-15 08:18:39,728 INFO Config finding global option default-region 2015-09-15 08:18:39,728 INFO Config novalue for default-region 2015-09-15 08:18:39,729 INFO Config finding global option max-retries 2015-09-15 08:18:39,729 INFO Config novalue for max-retries 2015-09-15 08:18:39,729 INFO Config finding global option timeout 2015-09-15 08:18:39,729 INFO Config novalue for timeout 2015-09-15 08:18:39,729 WARNING IAM added fake region name undefined-24923 2015-09-15 08:18:39,729 DEBUG HmacV4Auth using auth info from environment 2015-09-15 08:18:39,729 INFO ListAccounts parameters: {'Action': 'ListAccounts', 'Version': '2010-05-08'} 2015-09-15 08:18:39,729 DEBUG ListAccounts sending flattened params as form data 2015-09-15 08:18:39,732 INFO IAM sending request (attempt 1 of 3) 2015-09-15 08:18:39,737 DEBUG HmacV4Auth payload hash: fc52f58f8806b7841e01fdfff4049c30cfd871704084a9b52f83041c13e84cd3 2015-09-15 08:18:39,738 DEBUG HmacV4Auth scope: 20150915/undefined-24923/iam/aws4_request 2015-09-15 08:18:39,738 DEBUG HmacV4Auth canonical URI: /services/Euare 2015-09-15 08:18:39,738 DEBUG HmacV4Auth canonical query: 2015-09-15 08:18:39,738 DEBUG HmacV4Auth canonical headers: ['content-length:38', 'content-type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded', 'host:127.0.0.1:8773', 'x-amz-content-sha256:fc52f58f8806b7841e01fdfff4049c30cfd871704084a9b52f83041c13e84cd3', 'x-amz-date:20150915T151839Z'] 2015-09-15 08:18:39,738 DEBUG HmacV4Auth signed headers: content-length;content-type;host;x-amz-content-sha256;x-amz-date 2015-09-15 08:18:39,738 DEBUG HmacV4Auth canonical request: 'POST\n/services/Euare\n\ncontent-length:38\ncontent-type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded\nhost:127.0.0.1:8773\nx-amz-content-sha256:fc52f58f8806b7841e01fdfff4049c30cfd871704084a9b52f83041c13e84cd3\nx-amz-date:20150915T151839Z\n\ncontent-length;content-type;host;x-amz-content-sha256;x-amz-date\nfc52f58f8806b7841e01fdfff4049c30cfd871704084a9b52f83041c13e84cd3' 2015-09-15 08:18:39,738 DEBUG HmacV4Auth string to sign: 'AWS4-HMAC-SHA256\n20150915T151839Z\n20150915/undefined-24923/iam/aws4_request\nf9b7c0f3727a74c514054ae7182071ef1410271d2a07ebc17b5da67c8f87443f' 2015-09-15 08:18:39,739 DEBUG HmacV4Auth signature: a5572cb0d3795eb44e58dab66bb0ea802cddd43521abdc20cf8da9dee243d289 2015-09-15 08:18:39,739 DEBUG HmacV4Auth signed headers: content-length;content-type;host;x-amz-content-sha256;x-amz-date 2015-09-15 08:18:39,739 DEBUG IAM request method: POST 2015-09-15 08:18:39,739 DEBUG IAM request url: http://127.0.0.1:8773/services/Euare 2015-09-15 08:18:39,739 DEBUG IAM request header: Authorization: AWS4-HMAC-SHA256 Credential=AKIAARTJRF5CDDLVJWJZ/20150915/undefined-24923/iam/aws4_request, SignedHeaders=content-length;content-type;host;x-amz-content-sha256;x-amz-date, Signature=a5572cb0d3795eb44e58dab66bb0ea802cddd43521abdc20cf8da9dee243d289 2015-09-15 08:18:39,739 DEBUG IAM request header: Content-Length: 38 2015-09-15 08:18:39,739 DEBUG IAM request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded 2015-09-15 08:18:39,739 DEBUG IAM request header: Host: 127.0.0.1:8773 2015-09-15 08:18:39,739 DEBUG IAM request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.3.0-pre1-2-gcbbc0e7 (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-573.3.1.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.3.4 requests/2.6.0 2015-09-15 08:18:39,739 DEBUG IAM request header: X-Amz-Content-SHA256: fc52f58f8806b7841e01fdfff4049c30cfd871704084a9b52f83041c13e84cd3 2015-09-15 08:18:39,739 DEBUG IAM request header: X-Amz-Date: 20150915T151839Z 2015-09-15 08:18:39,739 DEBUG IAM request data: Action: ListAccounts 2015-09-15 08:18:39,739 DEBUG IAM request data: Version: 2010-05-08 2015-09-15 08:18:39,754 DEBUG IAM response time: 0.014 seconds 2015-09-15 08:18:39,754 INFO IAM response status: 307 2015-09-15 08:18:39,754 DEBUG IAM response header: connection: close 2015-09-15 08:18:39,755 DEBUG IAM response header: date: Tue, 15 Sep 2015 15:18:39 UTC 2015-09-15 08:18:39,755 DEBUG IAM response header: location: http://10.111.5.133:8773/services/Euare 2015-09-15 08:18:39,764 ERROR IAM response status: 403 2015-09-15 08:18:39,764 DEBUG IAM response header: connection: close 2015-09-15 08:18:39,764 DEBUG IAM response header: content-length: 226 2015-09-15 08:18:39,764 DEBUG IAM response header: content-type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 2015-09-15 08:18:39,764 DEBUG IAM response header: date: Tue, 15 Sep 2015 15:18:39 UTC 2015-09-15 08:18:39,765 DEBUG ListAccounts -- response content -- 403 ForbiddenMissing required parameter: AWSAccessKeyIdMissing required parameter: AWSAccessKeyId 2015-09-15 08:18:39,765 DEBUG ListAccounts -- end of response content -- 2015-09-15 08:18:39,765 INFO ListAccounts result: failure euare-accountlist: error (403 Forbidden): Missing required parameter: AWSAccessKeyId Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/bin/euare-accountlist", line 6, in euca2ools.commands.iam.listaccounts.ListAccounts.run() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 305, in run cmd.handle_cli_exception(err) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 302, in run result = cmd.main() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 205, in main response = self.send() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 276, in send return BaseRequest.send(self) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 171, in send return self.handle_server_error(err) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 158, in send auth=self.auth) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/service.py", line 226, in send_request self.handle_http_error(response) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/iam/__init__.py", line 55, in handle_http_error raise AWSError(response) euca2ools.exceptions.AWSError: (403, 'Forbidden', '403 Forbidden', 'Missing required parameter: AWSAccessKeyId') {noformat}
fields.summary: python-requests 2 causes admin tools to not add signatures when redirected

comments.body:
This is caused by installing python-requests-2.6.0-3.el6, which is new in RHEL 6.7.

Edit:  that, in turn is caused by the fix for [CVE-2014-1829|https://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2014-1829], which is caused by sending Authorization headers in redirected requests.

Verified 
{code}
[root@a-20 ~]# rpm -q python-requests
python-requests-2.6.0-3.el6.noarch
[root@a-20 ~]# euca-version 
euca2ools 3.3.0-pre1-12-g67774c3 (Yokohama)
eucalyptus 4.2.0

[root@a-20 ~]# eval `clcadmin-assume-system-credentials`
[root@a-20 ~]# euare-userlistbypath 
arn:aws:iam::000029925448:user/admin
{code}
{code}
